title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 169.4 - Allowable costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 169.4 - Allowable costs

State Regulations

Costs which may be included in the 50 percent of the total
program cost paid by the employer specific training grant shall include: (a) curriculum development; (b) instructional salaries; (c) combination of on-the-job training and
classroom training; (d) counseling; (e) support
services; (f) project supervision
and administration; and
(g) such
other costs as may be approved by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
169.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
